settings.heading: We provide comprehensive Shopify support services designed to ensure your online store operates smoothly and efficiently.

settings.caption: We offer a range of email marketing services designed to elevate your brand and maximise your customer engagement.

settings.text: Our Shopify website management and support services cover everything from routine maintenance and troubleshooting to performance optimisation, allowing you to focus on growing your business. Additionally, we offer detailed Shopify website audits to assess your store's performance, identify areas for improvement, and implement effective strategies to enhance user experience and drive sales. With our expertise and commitment to excellence, we help you maximise the potential of your Shopify store and achieve your business goals.

settings.title: Shopify website management and support
settings.text: Our Shopify website management and support services are designed to keep your online store running without disruption. We provide ongoing maintenance, including regular updates to themes and apps, monitoring for performance issues, and troubleshooting any technical problems that may arise. We're dedicated to ensuring your website remains secure, fast, and functional, allowing you to focus on growing your business while we handle the technical aspects. Whether you need assistance with product uploads, payment processing, or user experience enhancements, we are here to provide the support you need.

settings.title: Shopify website audits
settings.text: Our Shopify website audit service offers a comprehensive evaluation of your online store to identify strengths and areas for improvement. We analyse various aspects of your website, including performance, SEO, usability, and conversion rates, to provide actionable insights and recommendations. By conducting a thorough audit, we help you understand how well your store meets the needs of your customers and identify opportunities to optimise your site for better engagement and sales. Our goal is to equip you with the knowledge and strategies necessary to enhance your Shopify store's overall performance and achieve your business objectives.

"We very much see Times 2 as stakeholders in our business as they’ve always gone above and beyond to make sure we get rockstar service and a solution that bottom line makes us money and gives our customers the easiest possible online ordering experience. We’ve just re-platformed our website to Shopify this summer and the numbers don’t lie! Increased traffic, revenue and and customer satisfaction have all shot through the roof. We need have a future proof website delivered on budget, on time with some really complex backend requirements, Times 2 are very much at the heart of our business.”

"Times 2 have been nothing but amazing from our very first meeting... they have taken my ideas/sketches/dreams and made them a reality! I spent months going back and forth with other avenues to no avail. I knew what I wanted to do but I didn’t know how or if it was even going to be possible. Not only did they create a website that looks fantastic but is super easy to use for both the customer and for myself and my staff. I am not the most technically able so they showed me how to navigate the website with ease whilst always at the other end of the phone should anything need explaining for the second or even third time. I cannot thank them enough, not only do I now have a website to be proud of but I have the increase in revenue to go with it.”
